name: Ninja Basketball II
description:
Ninja Basketball II

a prototype by @pattheflip

the controls:

P1 - WAD to move, space to throw

P2 - arrow keys to move, numpad 0 to throw

the rules

touch the ball to pick it up, press and hold throw to charge shot, release to shoot

touch opponent with ball or throw kunai to stun opponent and make them drop ball

basket score is based on ball airtime

kunai can be picked up if they're stuck in a wall

you can double jump

leave feedback in the comments please
